title: Claudio Ranieri says he speaks "s*** English" to his Leicester stars but claims they all understand him
text:
Claudio Ranieri says he speaks "s*** English" to his Leicester stars but claims they all understand him The Foxes have released a statement to confirm their 'unwavering support' for the Italian Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Ranieri turns the air blue as he's quizzed about relationship with his players Share this video Get football   
A spirited and freshly backed Claudio Ranieri says he speaks "s*** English" to his Leicester City stars, but claims the players still understand him. 
The Foxes released a statement earlier today saying that the Italian, who won the Premier League with the side last season, has their unwavering support. 
Leicester City currently find themselves 16th in the league and a point above the relegation places. 
But in his pre-match FA Cup fourth round replay press conference, Ranieri remained in good spirits and claimed his relationship with his players is the same as last season. Claudio Ranieri remains in good spirits (Photo: Plumb Images/Leicester City FC via Getty) 
He said: "I speak the same s*** English and they understand me. No problem. 
"It's important they understand me." Ranieri wasn't afraid to tell the truth (Photo: Plumb Images/Leicester City FC via Getty) 
Ranieri also insisted his Leicester 'warriors' will fight their way out of trouble. 
With speculation surrounding Ranieri's future at the club, the Foxes released a statement to reiterate their 'unwavering support' for their manager , and the Italian insists he is still 'very confident' in the club. 
"This club, these players came from the bottom to win a title," Ranieri said. "They made all the steps and for this reason I am very confident. 
"These players are warriors. They have already lived this situation. They know the problem, they know the enemy. Never before in my career did I win a title. I can say thank you all my life to the players. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
